youtube.title: 3D CT Scan of a Pregnant Patient: Medical Reasons Explained
youtube.description: Explore the rare and fascinating world of medical imaging. This video shows a 3D reconstruction of a CT scan of a pregnant patient's abdomen and pelvis. We discuss why such a procedure might be necessary and the science behind the imagery. Subscribe for more biology and medical insights!
